definition: The stage of life that follows childhood and precedes old age, typically characterized by increased responsibilities, independence, and maturity. It is commonly used to refer to the period of adulthood or the phase of being an adult.

examples.german: Die Erwachsenenphase beginnt nach der Jugendphase.
examples.english: The adult phase begins after the youth phase.

examples.german: In der Erwachsenenphase übernimmt man mehr Verantwortung.
examples.english: In the adult phase, one takes on more responsibility.

examples.german: Die Erwachsenenphase ist geprägt von beruflicher Entwicklung.
examples.english: The adult phase is characterized by professional development.

examples.german: In der Erwachsenenphase bildet man eine eigene Familie.
examples.english: In the adult phase, one starts their own family.

examples.german: Die Erwachsenenphase ist eine Zeit des persönlichen Wachstums.
examples.english: The adult phase is a time of personal growth.
